name: blocklearner
description: A MERN stack application for learning

scripts.install-all: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && mkdir -p public && cp -r ../frontend/dist/* public/ && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const publicDir=path.join(process.cwd(),'public'); if (!fs.existsSync(path.join(publicDir,'index.html'))) { console.error('Frontend build failed: index.html not found in ' + publicDir); process.exit(1); }"
